question: "'The Doors' generated a controversy with the single ""Hello, I Love You"" in 1968 when the press pointed out it's resemblance to the 1965 hit ""All Day and All of the Night"" of which band?"
api_result: The band that performed the 1965 hit "All Day and All of the Night" is The Kinks. The Doors' single "Hello, I Love You" generated controversy due to its resemblance to this earlier song.
